Detailed Description

Provides generic methods for SitePages for WebApplications. It is a "call back" class that auto sets itself into WebApplication unique instance.

It sets ApplicationStart /ApplicationEnd with respectively OnLoad / OnUnLoad and Launch Process()

All the processing of children will be in Process() method.

Definition at line 44 of file AbstractSitePage.php.

instanciates an AbstractSitePage (for overwriting only).

ALL children MUST call parent::__construct()

It initialises application for running as Web application on the base of this class child.

static AbstractSitePage::GetInstance (   )  [static]
 

Gets a unique instance of current class. Create it if it doesn't exist. Children must call parent::getInstance( __CLASS__ )

This method MUST be redefined in ALL children.
